page.title: 08ROADS AND TRAFFIC
page.content:
In our square there are 22 roads.The total length of the roads is about 6000 km.Most of the roads are small, residential roads. The{A6}goes between Luton and Bedford.We counted the traffic for a quarter of an hour every hour for one school day.
More cars went South than North.More lorries went north than South.More vans went South than North. The buses more or less the same.There were very few buses and bikes. 12.15pm and 1.15pm are the busiest times. There were quite a lot of lorries and vans.There were more cars than anything else. The total of the northbound traffic between 9am and 4pm was 4968 vehicles.The southbound traffic was 5440 vehicles.
